item.description:
Admiral Fallow is an amazing Scottish band. I have been playing their new album , Trees Burst in Snow, for months now.

Admiral Fallow adds clarinet, flute, double bass and four jaw-dropping voices to the usual indie line-up to smash through their joyous, heart-filled, orchestral-tinged and beautifully well crafted songs. They are playing at Cafe 939 ( run by Berklee students). The venue is small and has great accoustics. Tickets are only 10 bucks! What else are you gonna due on a Wednesday?

Here is the link to a youtube video for Beetle in the Box from the new album.
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=A_NfgOP9c_0

Here is what they sound like live...

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IJa8e-CZBB4&feature=relmfu

The concert starts at 8, but I will be there by 7 to grab a bite to eat. I am easy to spot and look just like my profile picture. I'll shoot an email out the day before with my cell number and what I'll be wearing.
item.name: Admiral Fallow / Joy Kills Sorrow / Shea Vaccaro
